content: googly eye frog 4mm hook 4 weight yarn googly eye ring body attach yarn to googly eye ring chain 1 11hdc around ring ch2 join to 1st st behind the eyes 11hdc ch2 ch1 half_double_crochet in first st same as join half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2hdc 2x half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2hdc in each of the chs behind the eyes or just place 4hdc around ch2 join to top of 1sst st 18hdc ch1 half_double_crochet in 1st st same as join half_double_crochet in each st around join to 1st st 18 ch1 half_double_crochet in 1st st same as join half_double_crochet in each st around join to 1st st 18 ch1 single_crochet in 1st st same as join single_crochet in each st around join to 1st st 18 ch1 single_crochet in 1st st same as join single_crochet in next st decrease single_crochet single_crochet decrease 3x single_crochet in last 2 st join 1st st 14 ch1 single_crochet in 1st st same as join decrease single_crochet decrease 3x single_crochet in last 2 st join to 1st st 10 slightly stuff to keep shape ch1 decrease around join to 1st st 5 f/o leaving tail to sew closed back legs make 2 attach yarn to back about 5 st apart i placed mine between row 6 & 7 ch11 slip_stitch in first 4ch chain 4 slip_stitch in 3 chs slip_stitch back in the 4th ch4 slip_stitch in chain 3 and slip_stitch back it the original chain space there should be 3 slip_stitch in this chain slip_stitch the remaining sts of leg join to body repeat for other leg front legs attach yarn to front about 4 st apart i placed mine between row 2 and 3 ch8 slip_stitch in first 3 chs chain 3 2 slip_stitch in chain slip_stitch back in the 3rd ch3 2 slip_stitch in chain and slip_stitch back it the original chain space there should be 3 slip_stitch in this chain slip_stitch the remaining sts of leg join to body
